content: Taken together, our medical businesses in Canada and internationally generated $39.5 million of revenue, up 25% from Tier 1. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. And so I get it's easy to sort of take the pieces of the business and compare medical and rec, but for us, particularly as the manufacturer, working with science and genetics, we see significant efficiencies and advantages in being in bulk, even if we're not going to be a market leader in every market, say in rec where we would be in medical. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question.
